name: Building a New World
description: The appearance of a planet via temporal anomaly is shocking enough. But the fact that it appears in the Neutral Zone presents a host of other issues. Investigate the new world while keeping tensions at bay.
rules:
-- Unique Section 31, Maquis and Romulan Star Empire Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Barrows, Kaplan, T'Pol and Romulan Crew will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Barrows, Kaplan, T'Pol and Romulan Crew
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: C. Dax
featured_crew.flavor: Seventh host of the Dax symbiont, a close friend and mentor of Sisko, and an excellent diplomat.

action.name: Aren't You Happy To See Me?

featured_crew.name: Marie Kaplan
featured_crew.flavor: A member of the USS Voyager crew who died while responding to a distress call.

featured_crew.name: T'Pol
featured_crew.flavor: When Archer was infected by temporal parasites, T'Pol took command of the Enterprise.

rewards.name: Section 31 Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Section 31 faction missions.

rewards.name: Maquis Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Maquis faction missions.

rewards.name: Romulan Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Romulan Star Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: 10x S. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Standard Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Section 31 faction missions.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: C. Dax
rewards.flavor: Seventh host of the Dax symbiont, a close friend and mentor of Sisko, and an excellent diplomat.

action.name: Aren't You Happy To See Me?

rewards.name: T'Pol
rewards.flavor: When Archer was infected by temporal parasites, T'Pol took command of the Enterprise.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

goals.flavor: Assess potential threats to the Romulan Star Empire.

potential_rewards.name: Romulan Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Romulan Star Empire faction missions.

potential_rewards.name: Credits
potential_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

screens.text: "A planet has appeared in the Romulan Neutral Zone by way of a temporal anomaly. As one might expect, the Empire has gone on high alert, treating the planet with suspicion."
"Of course the Romulans would treat an entire planet brought here by anomaly the same as they would a hostile ship. As if that planet came here intentionally."

"But it is pretty suspicious that a whole planet came through an anomaly. Maybe there is more to this than the usual anomaly. On a more serious note, there was a Maquis ship in the area that has disappeared. We think it may have crashed into the planet."
"However, searching for it will be difficult with the Empire on high alert. Captain, we would like you to investigate, but please, exercise caution."
